mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_REG_DATE, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE, (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM "BOARD" b JOIN PROJECT_MEMBER USING (PM_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" m USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE b.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO) AS "REG_MEMBER_NAME", (SELECT PROFILE_IMG FROM "BOARD" b JOIN PROJECT_MEMBER USING (PM_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" m USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE b.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO) AS "REG_PROFILE_IMG", (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM "BOARD" b JOIN PROJECT_MEMBER pm ON (pm.PM_NO = b.UPDATE_PM_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" m USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE b.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO) AS "UPDATE_MEMBER_NAME", (SELECT PROFILE_IMG FROM "BOARD" b JOIN PROJECT_MEMBER pm ON (pm.PM_NO = b.UPDATE_PM_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" m USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE b.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO) AS "UPDATE_PROFILE_IMG" FROM BOARD WHERE WORKSPACE_NO = ${workspaceNo} AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_SORT
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATE_PM_NO = ${pmNo} WHERE BOARD_NO = ${boardNo}
